caption: I have traveled all over the world and this milk foam is one of the best I have had. floats perfectly not too salty or cheesy. went back two days in a row. the oolong is perfect not over brewed. I recommend the oolong milk tea low sweetened and add cheese foam on top. the Taiwanese sausage was good but I'd say it's over priced for what you get.
Amazing mango smoothie with cloud cream! Friendly services and plenty of traditional and modern-take options.

This is such a cool place to visit in Argyle for those milk and bubble tea aficionados! The teas are so delicious and the packaging is so cute as well. They also offer snacks not just drinks and the popcorn chicken is a must try. The place alsi has cool murals for picture taking.

Definitely my new favorite boba place in Argyle. Got the Peach Watermelon Jasmine Green Tea Yakult with yogurt boba, its so tasty! Not too sweet (I got 50% sweetness) just how I like it. The logo is super cute too! Didn't stick around inside the store for long due to COVID, but it looked clean and well kept. There's an order kiosk too which was convenient. So glad that a good bubble tea place opened up where Bingo used to be!  2/27/2021 update: truly wish I could give this place 10 stars LOOK AT THE CUTE DRINK HOLDER!!!

This is THE spot to be!  I was totally psyched when I found out about this second location! I LOVE the Chinatown location but I don't be in the area as much as I am on Argyle.  I ADORED their strawberry yogurt with crystal boba at the Chinatown location so I had to get it again! Just like last time, it was ahhhhhmazing!!  I look forward to trying their other drinks, their hot pot AND seafood boil!!!
Authentic tasting milk tea! One of my Chicago faves!

There's a ton of drink selections hot and cold as well as a really comfy atmosphere. The staff were super kind and patient even when we were taking long to order. Thank you, definitely a new favorite!
It is such a perfect location right off the Argyle stop. The staff was very helpful in figuring out the menu and the drink was amazing! Definitely my new favorite boba place.

January 14,2021 I order avocado cloud smoothie. My beverage didn't had cloud foam, sea salt cream cheese, or milk which ever was suppose to come with, as it was listed on the menu “avocado cloud.” This drink taste sour fruity drink and I have no idea what I am drinking. I expect this place same as Chinatown but is a total disappointment. Honestly I definitely wouldn’t be back.
